instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the prediction models on the molecular profiling of B and T lymphocytes for the activation status of B and T lymphocytes, and how well did it perform?
Output: The metric chosen to evaluate the prediction models for the activation status of B and T lymphocytes was the Area Under the Curve (AUC). The AUC value is a measure of the model's ability to distinguish between activated and non-activated lymphocytes. In this case, the AUC values for the prediction models were reported to be 0.98 for activated lymphocytes in general and 0.99 for activated B lymphocytes specifically. These high AUC values indicate that the models performed very well in accurately predicting the activation status of B and T lymphocytes based on their molecular profiles.
